body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       PARK GROUNDS  Open daily, year-round 7 AM to dark (1/2 hr after sunset).   VISITOR CENTER  9 AM - 5 PM daily. (The Encampment Store will be closed January 4, 2016) 9 AM - 6 PM daily, June 14 through August 31.  Closed Thanksgiving, Christmas, & New Years Day.  The park film plays in the theater next to the Visitor Center from 9:30 am until one hour before closing.  WASHINGTON'S HEADQUARTERS  9 AM - 5 PM daily, March - December.  9 AM - 5 PM weekends, January 4 - March 4, 2016 & President's Day.  9 AM - 6 PM daily, June 14 through August 15.  Closed Thanksgiving, Christmas, & New Years Day.   TRAIN STATION  9 AM - 5 PM daily, March - December & President's Day Weekend.  9 AM - 5 PM weekends, January 4 - March 4, 2016 Closed Thanksgiving, Christmas, & New Years Day.   WASHINGTON MEMORIAL CHAPEL  11:00 AM to 5:00 PM Monday - Saturday & 12:00 PM to 5:00 PM Sunday.   CHAPEL CABIN SHOP  10:00 AM to 5:00 PM daily.   VARNUM'S QUARTERS  12:00 PM to 4:00 PM weekends, April 2 through October 31.   VARNUM'S PICNIC AREA PARKING LOT  7 AM to dark daily, April - October.  7 AM to dark weekends through November.
title: Valley Forge National Historical Park: Operating Hours & Seasons
